	1.3 pydo
		当前buffer每行执行pydo语句，并且被pydo return替换	
			:pydo return "%s\t%d" % (line[::-1], len(line))
			for examples:
					12
					2i2
					aaa3
				after pydon:
					21	2
					2i2	3
					3aaa	4
			:pydo if line: return "%3d: %s" % (linenr, line)
		
	1.4 pyfile
		:pyfile myscript.py
		
	1.5 full-py
		:python from vim import *
		:python from string import upper
		:python current.line = upper(current.line)
		:python print "Hello"
		:python str = current.buffer[0] buffer[0] ---> 0 is line 0, 1 is line 1 in vim buffer
